webDesignPage.title: Web Design
webDesignPage.subTitle: Crafting Beautiful and Functional Designs
webDesignPage.description: We design stunning, user-centered websites that enhance brand visibility and user experience.
webDesignPage.researchDescription: We explore your brand and audience to craft the best user-centered designs.
webDesignPage.wireframingDescription: Our designers create wireframes and prototypes to visualize the structure and flow.
webDesignPage.designDevelopmentDescription: We focus on both aesthetics and functionality to deliver an exceptional user experience.
webDesignPage.brandingDescription: We ensure your brand identity is visually appealing and consistent across your website.
webDesignPage.testingLaunchDescription: Rigorous testing to ensure your site is fully functional, responsive, and ready for launch.
webDesignPage.whyChooseUs: Why Choose Our Web Design Services?
webDesignPage.testimonial1Text: Their designs elevated our brand and helped increase user engagement!
webDesignPage.testimonial2Text: Our website now looks amazing and functions perfectly thanks to their work.
webDesignPage.faq1Question: What web design services do you offer?
webDesignPage.faq1Answer: We offer full UI/UX design, prototyping, branding, and more.
webDesignPage.faq2Question: How long does it take to design a website?
webDesignPage.faq2Answer: Depending on the complexity, the design phase typically takes 4-6 weeks.
webDesignPage.footerText: Ready to elevate your online presence with stunning web design?

webDevPage.title: Web Development
webDevPage.subTitle: Building the Future of the Web, One Line of Code at a Time!
webDevPage.description: We develop robust, scalable websites and applications tailored to your business needs.
webDevPage.requirementDescription: We start by understanding your business goals and technical requirements.
webDevPage.planningDescription: We design a robust architecture and plan the project workflow to ensure scalability and security.
webDevPage.developmentDescription: Our developers write clean, efficient code to build high-performance websites and applications.
webDevPage.testingDescription: We rigorously test the product and deploy it to a live environment, ensuring smooth functionality.
webDevPage.maintenanceDescription: Post-launch, we provide ongoing support and maintenance to keep your website running smoothly.
webDevPage.whyChooseUs: Why Choose Our Web Development Services?
webDevPage.expertTeam: Expert team with years of experience
webDevPage.testimonial1Text: Their web development expertise transformed our business operations, making us more efficient and competitive.
webDevPage.testimonial2Text: Reliable, professional, and skilled. They exceeded our expectations at every step.
webDevPage.faq1Question: What web development services do you offer?
webDevPage.faq1Answer: We offer front-end and back-end development, CMS integration, API development, and more.
webDevPage.faq2Question: How long does it take to develop a website?
webDevPage.faq2Answer: The timeline varies based on the project's complexity, but a standard site typically takes 6-8 weeks.
webDevPage.footerText: Ready to take your online presence to the next level?

webAppPage.title: Web Application Development
webAppPage.description: We design, develop, and deploy robust web applications tailored to your business needs.
webAppPage.requirementAnalysisDescription: We thoroughly assess your business requirements to define the scope and strategy.
webAppPage.designDevelopmentDescription: Our team designs intuitive user interfaces and develops scalable backend systems.
webAppPage.mobileResponsivenessDescription: We ensure your application is fully optimized for mobile and tablet devices.
webAppPage.databaseIntegrationDescription: We integrate powerful databases to handle your application's data securely and efficiently.
webAppPage.benefitsTitle: Why Choose Us for Web Application Development?
webAppPage.benefit1: Custom-built applications tailored to your business needs
webAppPage.benefit2: Expertise in front-end, back-end, and database integration
webAppPage.benefit3: Secure and scalable solutions for long-term growth
webAppPage.benefit4: Ongoing support and maintenance for your web applications
webAppPage.testimonial1Text: Their expertise in web application development helped us streamline our processes and improve efficiency.
webAppPage.testimonial2Text: Our business operations have never been smoother thanks to the custom web app they built for us.
webAppPage.faq1Question: What web application services do you offer?
webAppPage.faq1Answer: We offer full-stack development, mobile responsiveness, API integration, and more.
webAppPage.faq2Question: How do you ensure the security of web applications?
webAppPage.faq2Answer: We implement the latest security protocols and best practices to safeguard your data.
webAppPage.footerText: Ready to launch your custom web application?

portofolioPage.clinicaDescription: Innovative care for a healthier tomorrow

aboutUsPage.heroSubtitle: Learn more about our team, mission, and values.
aboutUsPage.danyRole: Full-Stack Developer and Expert Graphic Designer
aboutUsPage.danyDescription: Meet Daniela, a talented developer with a degree in Economic Informatics, who is currently pursuing a master's degree in the same field. An expert in both software and hardware, as well as in programming and data analysis, Daniela combines technical skills with economic knowledge to deliver innovative solutions and optimize processes efficiently. Additionally, Daniela is also a remarkable graphic designer, with a keen eye for detail and a creative approach that perfectly complements her technical expertise. Her ability to integrate design with technical solutions makes her a versatile and essential contributor to any project.
aboutUsPage.tomaDescription: Meet Toma, a consummate professional, holding a degree in Informatics with advanced specialization in hardware and software. With extensive experience in designing and implementing complex systems, he stands out for his exceptional ability to solve technical challenges and bring remarkable innovations to every project. His top-tier technical skills are paired with a practical vision, making him a vital pillar in any development team. Moreover, Toma is known for his precision and rigor in addressing every task, ensuring high-quality results in any professional context.
aboutUsPage.storyText: We are two young and ambitious graduates who founded this startup with a clear vision for the future. Driven by innovation and a passion for technology, we’ve had the opportunity to collaborate with various companies, learning the trade and refining our expertise along the way. Through these partnerships, we’ve gained valuable experience that allows us to specialize in our field and deliver cutting-edge solutions. We pride ourselves on being visionary professionals, always eager to push the boundaries of what is possible and provide our clients with a fresh and innovative approach.
aboutUsPage.missionText: Our mission is to empower businesses to achieve their full potential through innovative technology solutions and exceptional service. We are driven by a passion for making a difference and a commitment to our clients' success.
aboutUsPage.value1: Integrity: We uphold the highest standards of integrity in all our actions.
aboutUsPage.value2: Innovation: We embrace innovation and strive for continuous improvement.
aboutUsPage.value3: Customer Focus: We are dedicated to meeting and exceeding our clients' expectations.
aboutUsPage.value4: Teamwork: We work together to achieve collective goals and celebrate success.

contactPage.title: Contact Us!
contactPage.subtitle: We would have a pleasure to work with you!
contactPage.finalMessage: Your project becomes a reality. Feel free to reach out if you want to collaborate, or maybe just say hello :)

homePage.whyDWSHeading: Launch Your Fully-Featured Online Store with WebBlackBox
homePage.whyDWSText1: At WebBlackBox (WBB), we specialize in building custom websites designed to meet your business needs—whether it's e-commerce platforms, presentation websites, or complex web applications. Beyond design, we offer complete solutions, including database integration, secure hosting, and customized functionalities, ensuring a seamless online experience for your users.
homePage.whyDWSText2: We take pride in transforming your vision into an impactful online presence that exceeds expectations. At WebBlackBox, we don't just create websites; we build digital platforms that elevate your brand and provide real value to your customers.
homePage.getRidOfOldFiles: Get rid of old files. We offer a digital solution.

ourMissionHP.integrityText: We uphold the highest standards of integrity in all our actions, ensuring honesty, transparency, and ethical behavior in everything we do. Our commitment to integrity helps us build trust and long-lasting relationships.
ourMissionHP.innovationText: We embrace innovation and strive for continuous improvement, constantly seeking new ways to enhance our services and deliver exceptional value. By staying ahead of industry trends and fostering a culture of creativity, we ensure that our solutions are always forward-thinking and impactful.
ourMissionHP.customerFocusText: We are dedicated to meeting and exceeding our clients' expectations, consistently delivering tailored solutions that address their unique needs. By actively listening and responding to feedback, we ensure our clients receive the highest level of service and support.
ourMissionHP.teamworkText: We work together to achieve collective goals, fostering a collaborative environment where every team member's contribution is valued. By leveraging our diverse skills and supporting each other, we create stronger solutions and overcome challenges more effectively. We believe that shared success is the key to growth, and we take pride in celebrating our achievements as a unified team.

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
termsPage.section1: The material contained on this site has been prepared solely for the purpose of providing information regarding WebBlackBox.ro and the services it offers. By accessing this site, you acknowledge the rules of WebBlackBox, a provider of web design, online marketing, custom software development, digital application development, digital design, content creation, and sales intermediation services, as well as related services derived from those mentioned above that can be contracted through this site.
termsPage.section2: Even though WebBlackBox has responsibly structured and created the content of this site, there is no warranty (express or implied) for the accuracy or completeness of the information on this site or of those published by third parties referred to by links on the site.
termsPage.section3: No information on this site constitutes an offer, recommendation, invitation to sell, or solicitation of an offer.
termsPage.section4: By accessing this site, you agree that, to the extent permitted by law, WebBlackBox.ro cannot be held liable in any situation for any kind of damages (including special, indirect, or consequential damages), either in contract performance or through a civil tort arising from or in connection with information on the site or published by third parties referred to by a link on the site, and for the operation or non-operation of the website.
termsPage.section5: The provision of services by WebBlackBox.ro is subject to the standard contractual terms of WebBlackBox.ro regarding such services and goods, which can be provided in copy, upon request.
termsPage.section6: This site is protected by copyright, and all other intellectual property rights of WebBlackBox.ro (including but not limited to registered trademarks, patents, and design rights) as well as the brands included in the material, belong to WebBlackBox.ro. You are only allowed to save on your personal computer or print copies of materials available on this site for personal or non-commercial use; you are not allowed to adapt, modify, or reuse the text or images from the site without the prior written consent of WebBlackBox.ro.
termsPage.campaignTitle: Terms and Conditions for the Turnkey Sites Campaign
termsPage.campaignText: By accepting this, you agree that all video, photo, or audio materials, on any known or unknown medium at the time of publication, may be used in the communication campaigns of Web Black Box SRL at any time and on any platform without having any right of intervention over them.
termsPage.confidentialityText: The privacy policy applies to the use of information collected by the WebBlackBox.ro site during its access.
termsPage.cookiesText: WebBlackBox.ro may store a small file, commonly known as a 'cookie,' on your computer when you visit the WebBlackBox.ro website. We use cookies to broaden our knowledge of the use of our site and to help us determine how well it functions.
termsPage.personalInfoText: We collect and use personal information (including name, address, phone number, and email) exclusively for the purposes listed below: 1. Respond to your questions or requests; 2. Process orders or forms initiated by you; 3. Administer or fulfill our obligations in connection with any agreement you have with us; 4. Anticipate and resolve problems related to any services provided to you.
termsPage.otherSitesText: We are not responsible for the privacy policies and practices of other sites, even if you access third-party sites through links on our site or you connected to our site through links hosted on other sites.

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.section1: The website www.WebBlackBox.ro is represented and owned by Web Black Box S.R.L.
privacyPolicyPage.section2: We inform you that the contact details you provide are considered 'personal data' according to the provisions of Law no. 677/2001 of Romania.
privacyPolicyPage.section3: According to Law no. 677/2001 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and the free movement of such data, you have the following rights:
privacyPolicyPage.section4: Furthermore, in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) 679/2016, known as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the website www.WebBlackBox.ro, managed by Web Black Box S.R.L., commits to strictly respecting the confidentiality of personal data and clearly and transparently presenting the method of collecting and using data collected through the contact form, as described in the steps below.
privacyPolicyPage.rightToBeInformed: Right to be informed: the right to be informed about the identity of the personal data operator, the purpose of data processing, the recipients or categories of data recipients, the existence of the rights provided by Law no. 677/2001 for the data subject, and the conditions under which they can be exercised;
privacyPolicyPage.rightOfAccess: Right of access to data: the right to obtain from the operator, upon request and free of charge for one request per year, confirmation of whether data concerning you is being processed;
privacyPolicyPage.rightToIntervene: Right to intervene: the right to obtain, upon request and free of charge, the rectification, updating, blocking, deletion, or transformation into anonymous data of the data whose processing does not comply with the law, especially data that is incomplete or inaccurate;
privacyPolicyPage.informationCollectionText: We collect information when you register on our site. The information collected includes your first name, last name, email address, phone number, and a few questions about your needs regarding a website.
privacyPolicyPage.useOfInformationText: Any of the information we collect may be used to:
privacyPolicyPage.useOfInformationPoint1: Personalize your experience and meet your individual needs
privacyPolicyPage.useOfInformationPoint3: Contact you via email or phone
privacyPolicyPage.ecommercePrivacyText: We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. Your personal identification information will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason whatsoever, without your consent, other than for the purpose of providing a personalized offer based on your needs.
privacyPolicyPage.thirdPartyDisclosureText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacyPolicyPage.thirdPartyLegalText: We believe it is necessary to share information in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, violations of our terms of use, or as otherwise required by law.
privacyPolicyPage.informationProtectionText: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Only employees who need to perform a specific task (e.g., billing or providing a personalized offer) have access to personally identifiable information. The computers/servers used to store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment.
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesText: Yes. Cookies enhance access to our site and identify repeat visitors. Furthermore, cookies improve the user experience by tracking and targeting interests. This use of cookies, however, is not linked to any personally identifiable information on our site.
privacyPolicyPage.consentText: By submitting requests through the contact forms on this website or any other form of communication or platform that uses our identification data, and upon which we can validate the existence of belonging, you agree to our privacy policy by checking the specific box located under the contact form.
privacyPolicyPage.contactUsText: If you do not agree with our privacy policy regarding personal data, you can contact us at the phone number 0720 72 66 19 or send us an email at the address mentioned on the site, and later you can give or not give your consent regarding how we may use your personal data.
privacyPolicyPage.confirmationText: Thus, you confirm that you have read and understood the aspects mentioned in our privacy policy.
